ygData.subject: RE: Carillion song (was  Bard only equipment, a rant)
ygData.msgSnippet: i have only tried it on merchants that would not let me buy/sell, i believe they were dubious.  i get different results with the song though.  for example, in
ygData.messageBody:
i have only tried it on merchants that would not let me buy/sell, i believe
they were dubious. i get different results with the song though. for
example, in west commons with a dubious merchant, i was able to sing and get
the merchant to indifferent and sell to me. in oasis at the inn, i was
unable to sing but with a flute i could get the merchant to indifferent.
however, in south ro with singing and with a flute, i can not raise the dark
elf merchants at all, they remain dubious. so maybe it depends on how
dubious you really are (close to apprehensive or close to scowls). haven't
used enough to determine if level matters. i did not buy the song until
level 50, when i read about it on this list... pretty bad huh? coupled with
the fact that i am not a frequent visitor to my home town hehe.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 20 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server

> Once you hit
> scowls you are out of luck unless very high level bards get a
> better result.
> Shada?
>
> Kitasi
